titles: The loyal subjects exultation, for the coronation of King Charls the Second. To the tune of, When the king comes home in peace again.
notes: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685 --  Coronation --  Poetry.
